description: Arad Winwin calls up his favorite boy toy, Brad Payton and entices him with a swim. It's not long before Brad is enticed by the bulge growing in Arad's speedo. Brad blows him then climbs out of the pool so Arad can eat his hot, tight pink hole. The deep-tongue rim job turns into a sweaty fuck. Brad shoots his load then sits up so he can swallow Arad's jizz. title: Pool Mates, Scene #02
